mapper.insert: INSERT INTO complain (complain_id, complain_title, complain_content, parent_id) VALUES (complain_seq.NEXTVAL, #{complainTitle}, #{complainContent}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT complain_id AS "complainId", complain_title AS "complainTitle", TO_CHAR(complain_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "complainDate", complain_stat AS "complainStat" FROM complain WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY complain_id

SELECT complain_id AS "complainId", complain_title AS "complainTitle", TO_CHAR(complain_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "complainDate", complain_stat AS "complainStat", complain_content AS "complainContent" FROM complain WHERE complain_id = #{complainId}

SELECT complain_id AS complainId, complain_title AS complainTitle, complain_content AS complainContent, complain_date AS complainDate, complain_stat AS complainStat, admin_id AS adminId, parent_id AS parentId FROM ( SELECT complain_id, complain_title, complain_content, complain_date, complain_stat, admin_id, parent_id, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM complain where admin_id=#{adminId} ORDER BY complain_stat, complain_id ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM complain WHERE admin_id=#{adminId}

select complain_id AS complainId, complain_title AS complainTitle, complain_content AS complainContent, complain_date AS complainDate, complain_stat AS complainStat, admin_id AS adminId, parent_id AS parentId from complain where complain_id=#{complainId}

SELECT p.parent_name AS parentname, p.parent_phone AS parentphone, c.child_name AS childName, cr.classroom_name AS classroomName, cp.complain_id AS complainId FROM parent p, child c, classroom cr, complain cp WHERE (p.parent_id=c.parent_id) AND (c.classroom_id=cr.classroom_id) AND (p.parent_id=cp.parent_id) AND cp.complain_id=#{complainId}
mapper.update: UPDATE complain SET complain_stat='Y' WHERE complain_id=#{complainId}
